column2: nitharama baalachandhragea muvehi r/adhuNu madha sinahava saro)jaa menma agea malliigeath na\ngiigeath sith pinaviiya

column2: /agea na\ngiith malliith thavanata risith/an soyaa yathi
column3: /agea na\ngiith malliith thavanata risith/an soyaa yathi

column2: saro)jaa kAama measayea ek pasakath baalachandhra anek pasakath vadi vethi
column3: saro)jaa kAama measayea ek pasakath baalachandhra anek pasakath vadi vethi

column2: saro)jaath na\ngiith, malliith ekavara inndhag/aniima sirithak viya

column2: baalachandhra saro)jaagea nivasata p/amiNa dhivaa raatharii bho)jana g/aniimea dhii
